longMSG:
You are in the STEWARD ROOM on the 2nd floor.
There is a DESK and a FILE CABINET...
and......a ZOMBIE STEWARD smiling at you...no, showing his teeth does not mean smiling...
You may go NORTH to the HALLWAY2.
shortMSG:
You are in the STEWARD ROOM on the 2nd floor.
Features: ZOMBIE STEWARD, DESK, FILE CABINET
Areas you may go to:
NORTH/HALLWAY2
